resources.string: Megatron SR: A Superresolution Experiment Environment
ABOUT: This is a mobile application that utilizes super-resolution to further enhance an image. You may modify the configurations seen below, before proceeding in taking an image.
Produce nearest-neighbor, bilinear and bicubic HR images if debugging mode is enabled.
Enable image denoising. Recommended for low-light situations.
Feature point minimum distance. Higher value is recommended for shaky captures.
Image fusion noise threshold. Used for assessing image alignment techniques.
Choice of image alignment technique. Best alignment technique chooses the best image alignment method to use.
Choice of super-resolution technique. Fast mode prioritizes speed over accuracy. Full super-resolution mode considers all images for processing to have better chances of getting a clearer image.
